column12: Tooltip
str
Removes all traps from the current <Switch(PlayerParameter(109))><Case(1)>floor</Case><Case(2)>floor</Case><Case(3)>floor</Case><Case(4)>area</Case></Switch>.

Decreases damage received by 40%.

Increases the number of treasure coffers <If(Equal(PlayerParameter(109),4))>in<Else/>on</If> the next <Switch(PlayerParameter(109))><Case(1)>floor</Case><Case(2)>floor</Case><Case(3)>floor</Case><Case(4)>area</Case></Switch>.
